body.name: Women's Mandie Signature Fit 5 High Rise Jean
features: Color athens is a medium blue wash with a light fading effect, Made in a nice stretch denim
Signature 5 pocket jean with back pocket embroidery detail, zip front, Belt loops and straight leg.
Made in a nice stretch fabric to keep you moving in comfort throughout your day with the versatility to be dressed up or down for work, class or play. It's a must have piece for any ladies wardrobe.
Mid rise jean has a 31 inch inseam with a 15 1/4 inch leg opening
Bandolino is a feminine jeans wear brand known for its exceptional denim fit, innovative fabrics, and trend-right washes
body.description: Bandolino Blu Women's Apparel Mandie Signature fit Jean with five functional pockets, high rise waist confidence, easy opem zipper fly and convient belt loops on a straight leg fit body. Made in a nice stretch fabric that can easily be dressed up or down to keep you moving in comfort throughout your day whether for work, class or play. Pairs great with all tops from fashion forward to a basic tee and all footwear from trendy boots to your favorite Bandolino flats, a must have piece for any ladies wardrobe. It's distinctive, updated details, femininity and flawless fit are the signatures of the Bandolino brand. Bandolino is a feminine jeanswear brand known for its exceptional denim fit, innovative fabrics, and trend-right washes. Sophisticated knits, woven tops, and jackets that work back to the denim round out the product assortment. Bandolino is an accessible department store brand providing refreshing options for the fashionable missy consumer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bandolino Blu is a feminine jeans-wear brand known for its exceptional fit, innovative fabrics, and distinctive details. With a robust portfolio including: sophisticated knits, woven tops, and feminine jackets, Bandolino is your destination for a perfect pairing of quality and style. Let us complement your lifestyle, and desire for fashion with versatility. Bandolino Blu- Flawless fits, sophisticated fabrics and exceptional trends making it the perfect fit realistically and figuratively Distinctive, updated details, femininity and flawless fit are the signatures of the Bandolino brand. Our Brand's most Popular Style: Mandie Signature Straight Leg Jean - The Perfect fit jean. Figure-flattering is just the thing your collection has been missing. Made to be versatile while effortlessly chic, you'll be amazed by how many stylish ensembles you can create thanks to this wardrobe essential. Every woman should be given the gift of the perfect fit! * Our jeans run in sizes listed below: Missy sizes = 6 8 10 12 14 16 Petite sizes = 6P 8P 10P 12P 14P 16P Plus sizes = 16W 18W 20W 22W 24W

Mandie Signature Straight Mandie Skinny Bella Pull On Legging Style : A modern look with the classic fit you love from a straight leg. Make to be effortlessly chic while versatile for work or play. Amplify your denim wardrobe with luxe 360° flex for sensational stretch and incredible support giving you a figure-flattering silhouette that'll boost your confidence. Figure-flattering legging is a dreamy second skin. Silhouette boasts exceptional comfort and supportive shaping, perfect for all day wear. Description : Sits at natural waist, Contour hips and thighs, Straight leg fit, Zipper fly, Belt loops and Functional pockets. Curvy cut sides and back, Sits below natural waist, Skinny leg, Contour from hips to hem, Zipper fly, Belt loops and Functional pockets. Mid-rise sits below natural waist, Comfortable knit waistband, Contour from hips to hem, Skinny leg, Mock fly and Functional back pockets Inseam : 31 " 30 " 30 ” Leg Opening : 15 1/2 " 10.5 " 10 1/2 " Available in Petite or Plus sizes : ✓
BANDOLINO BLU - The Perfect Pairing Of Quality and Style

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I work part time in office, part time in the R&D lab, I need something comfortable, scratch resistant and stretchy while also looking professional and feeling good about how I look. This does all of the above! I mean I am just so happy as a slightly larger women, or average if you ask me, these are perfect because they slim you up enough but you dont struggle to slip into them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I've ordered 5 pairs in different colors & sizes. They run a bit large. They are nice and stretchy, even in the waist. Comes in lots of denim washes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big in the waist, short in the legs.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered my regular size then returned and sized down. I could probably go down another size and they’re still a little short. But they’re super comfortable and great for when you just want some comfy jeans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars These jeans run big
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 pairs of Bandolino jeans I bought several years ago that I love fit great. I ordered the same size 8 and same style but ones ordered too big. they just were too stretchy. I didn't like the feel of the denim.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST fitting jeans ever!!!!
reviews.reviewText: True to size, super cute, & comfy! Best jeans EVER!! Wash up very nicely. I purchased the petite size 12; Fit like they were made just for ME! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Like the way it wears. It is a light denim and very comfortable. It is made for long legged misses. A breeze to shorten.

reviews.reviewTitle: The legs come out right at the thigh
reviews.reviewText: I tried this brand for the first time. I loved the high waist and the way it made me feel. The problem was that it being a straight leg Jean is that the jeans just jutted out at the thighs. No tapering out or anything. It went from nice and snug to bulges at the thigh, then all the way down, and it wasn’t my thighs that were bulging, it was the material. I had to send them back and buy a different brand.
